== Ponchavadi (626864) ==

Ponchavadi is a village in the [[Ponda]] taluka of [[North Goa]] district with an area of 517 hectares and harbouring 931 households with total population of 4295 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[PONDA]] is at a distance of 22 km. Male population is 2140 and female population is 2155. Scheduled Caste Population is 3 and Scheduled Tribes population is 882. Census Location Code of the village is 626864<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

* Literate male population: 1758 (82.15%)
